info.title: Events Manager Api
info.description: A collection of endpoints for my events manager api

application/json.error: Another user with this email already exists

get.description:
api endpoint to get a center.
This endpoint by default also fetches the event slated for a center, To turn this off, simply set the query parameter centeronly to true.

api/v1/centers/<centerid>?centeronly=true

application/json.error: You are not authorized to perform this action

get.description:
This endpoint fetches all centers

The page query indicates the page to be fetched, the default limit for a valid page is 6.

The offset query indicates the index of item to fetch from, default value is set to 0.

The limit query indicates how many centers to be fetched, default value is set ton 6.

The capacity, rentalCost, type and name queries makes it possible to search for centers using them as search queries, note that they cannot be combined, the first key would be used as the search query.

x-unitTests.x-testDescription:
This endpoint fetches all centers

The page query indicates the page to be fetched, the default limit for a valid page is 6.

The offset query indicates the index of item to fetch from, default value is set to 0.

The limit query indicates how many centers to be fetched, default value is set ton 6.

The capacity, rentalCost, type and name queries makes it possible to search for centers using them as search queries, note that they cannot be combined, the first key would be used as the search query.
